00018 // the constructor
00019 ComponentGenerator::ComponentGenerator(QDomNode &generatorNode):
00020 Generator(generatorNode), scope_(ComponentGenerator::INSTANCE), groups_() {
00021 
00022         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = generatorNode.attributes();
00023 
00024         // get the spirit scope attribute
00025         QString scope = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:scope")).nodeValue();
00026         if (scope == QString("entity")) {
00027                 scope_ = ComponentGenerator::ENTITY;
00028         }
00029         else {
00030                 scope_ = ComponentGenerator::INSTANCE;
00031         }
00032 
00033         // go through all the child nodes of the component generator
00034         for (int i = 0; i < generatorNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00035                 QDomNode tempNode = generatorNode.childNodes().at(i);
00036 
00037                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:group")) {
00038                         QString groupName = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00039                         groupName = General::removeWhiteSpace(groupName);
00040                         groups_.append(groupName);
00041                 }
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 ComponentGenerator::ComponentGenerator( const ComponentGenerator &other ):
00046 Generator(other),
00047 scope_(other.scope_),
00048 groups_(other.groups_) {
00049 }
00050 
00051 ComponentGenerator& ComponentGenerator::operator=( const ComponentGenerator &other ) {
00052         if (this != &other) {
00053                 Generator::operator=(other);
00054                 scope_ = other.scope_;
00055                 groups_ = other.groups_;
00056         }
00057         return *this;
00058 }

00064 void ComponentGenerator::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00065         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:componentGenerator");
00066         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:hidden",
00067                         General::bool2Str(Generator::hidden_));
00068 
00069         // write the scope-attribute
00070         switch (scope_) {
00071         case ComponentGenerator::ENTITY: {
00072                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:scope", "entity");
00073                 break;
00074         }
00075         // ComponentGenerator::INSTANCE
00076         default: {
00077                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:scope", "instance");
00078                 break;
00079         }
00080         }
00081 
00082         // if mandatory name is missing
00083         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00084                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in spirit:"
00085                                 "generator"));
00086         }
00087         else {
00088                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00089         }
00090 
00091         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00092                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00093         }
00094 
00095         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00096                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00097         }
00098 
00099         if (phase_ >= 0) {
00100                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:phase", QString::number(phase_));
00101         }
00102 
00103         // if any parameters exist
00104         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00105                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00106 
00107                 // write each parameter
00108                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00109                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00113         }
00114 
00115         // write the spirit:apiType element
00116         switch (apiType_) {
00117         case Generator::TGI: {
00118                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:apiType", "TGI");
00119                 break;
00120         }
00121         // Generator::NONE
00122         default: {
00123                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:apiType", "none");
00124         }
00125         }
00126 
00127         // if mandatory generatorExe is missing
00128         if (generatorExe_.isEmpty()) {
00129                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory generatorExe is missing in "
00130                                 "spirit:generator"));
00131         }
00132         else {
00133                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:generatorExe", generatorExe_);
00134         }
00135 
00136         // write all groups
00137         for (int i = 0; i < groups_.size(); ++i) {
00138                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:group", groups_.at(i));
00139         }
00140 
00141         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:componentGenerator
00142 }

00144 ComponentGenerator::Instance ComponentGenerator::getScope() const {
00145         return scope_;
00146 }

00148 const QList<QString>& ComponentGenerator::getGroups() {
00149         return groups_;

00152 void ComponentGenerator::setGroups(QList<QString> &groups) {
00153         // delete old groups
00154         groups_.clear();
00155 
00156         // save the new groups
00157         groups_ = groups;
00158 }
